column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you are in chicago and wana have best deep dish pizza
column2: this is famous but not really worth of hype
column3: waiting an hour is fine but understandable
column4: we ordered the classic well done but turned out very hard bread crust
column5: too much of marinana sauce and tomatoes which overpowered the rest of the veggies or meat ( too tangy )
column7: chicken turkey sausage was good... but the soul of pizza which was the pizza sauce
column8: it was let down.. hence scoring it 2 of 5..
